Magmatron:

     He had quickly formulated a plan of attack. "Okay, this is what 
we are going to do. have you ever heard of Blitzkrieg? (spelling?) It 
is an ancient human stratgy of warfare. In this we strike at night, 
so optics are usless. I belive we have signal maskers still, if we 
don't we can make some. Okay? We go in fast and hard, take no 
prisoners, I want to establish ourselves as a strong fighting force. 
After the attack we will retreat, I am going to give a time limit on 
this, we don't want to risk to much damage to our systems, yet. I 
give you an hour to fight after I give the go ahead. There are plenty 
of weapons in the cache. YOu can have whatever you need."
     He commed the Destrocons. "I am going to need your flight 
abilities, report to the command room and we will discuss it."
     He turned back to the rest of his troops, then directly to 
Cygnar, "Where is the weakest base on the North American continent? 
And is it true that you have established another base in what wil 
become Syria? If so, goodie, goodie. We will need that one as well."
